description: Write a function that checks if a `hostname` is present in the `allowed_domains` list (case-insensitive). `allowed_domains` is a NULL-terminated array. Example (Allowed): is_hostname_in_list("GitHub.com", ["google.com", "github.com", NULL]) -> 1. Example (Denied): is_hostname_in_list("malicious.com", ["google.com", "github.com", NULL]) -> 0.
